price: 23. C’est Nous Qui faisons vivre et faisons mourir, et c’est Nous Qui hériterons (de Toute chose).
arabic: وَإِنَّا لَنَحۡنُ نُحۡيِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَنَحۡنُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-innā lanaḥnu nuḥ'yī wanumītu wanaḥnu al-wārithūna
